feature_description: Conjure dark crystals to bombard an enemy, dealing Magic Damage.
effect_values: Magic Damage based on companion level

feature_description: Conjure dark crystals to bombard an enemy, dealing Magic Damage and knocking them down.
morph_description: Adds knockdown effect to the target.

feature_description: Conjure dark crystals to bombard an enemy, dealing increased Magic Damage.
Call forth Daedric shards from the earth to immobilize enemies in front of you.
Call forth Daedric shards that deal Magic Damage when they expire.
Call forth Daedric shards with increased immobilization duration.
Imprison an enemy in a runic cage, stunning them.
Imprison an enemy in a runic cage, stunning them for longer.
Create a protective rune that stuns enemies who activate it.
Convert Health into Stamina over time.
Convert Health into Stamina and gain Minor Heroism.
effect_values: Convert Health to Stamina, Minor Heroism

feature_description: Convert Health into Stamina and restore Health over time.
effect_values: Convert Health to Stamina, Health regeneration

feature_description: Create a globe of negation that removes enemy effects and stuns them.
Create a globe that negates enemy effects and deals Magic Damage over time.
effect_values: Dispel, Stun, Silence, Magic Damage over time

feature_description: Create a globe that negates enemy effects and heals allies inside.
Summon an unstable familiar to fight at your side.
Summon a clannfear that can taunt enemies.
morph_description: Transforms into a tanking pet with taunt.

feature_description: Summon a volatile familiar that pulses with shock damage.
morph_description: Deals periodic Shock Damage to nearby enemies.

feature_description: Summon a winged twilight to attack enemies from range.
Summon a twilight tormentor that deals increased damage.
Summon a twilight matriarch that can heal allies.
morph_description: Can heal the companion and player.

feature_description: Protect yourself with Daedric armor, increasing your resistances.
Protect yourself with Daedric armor and gain damage boost on heavy attacks.
Protect yourself with Daedric armor and gain Minor Resolve.
morph_description: Grants Minor Resolve for additional resistances.

feature_description: Conjure globes of Daedric energy to protect yourself with a damage shield.
Conjure a stronger damage shield with increased absorption.
Conjure a damage shield that also restores resources when hit.
morph_description: Restores resources when shield absorbs damage.

feature_description: Summon an immobile storm atronach that zaps enemies with lightning.
Summon a greater storm atronach with increased damage and duration.
Summon a charged atronach that grants you synergy to activate lightning attacks.
Call down lightning to strike an enemy and explode if they fall below 20% Health.
Call down lightning with increased explosion damage.
Call down lightning that restores resources on kill.
morph_description: Restores resources when enemy dies to explosion.
effect_values: Shock Damage, Resource restore on kill

feature_description: Manifest as pure lightning, gaining Major Resolve and dealing damage to nearby enemies.
effect_values: Major Resolve, Shock Damage around self

feature_description: Manifest as lightning with increased armor and spell resistance.
effect_values: Major Resolve, Minor Expedition, Shock Damage

feature_description: Manifest as a hurricane that grows in damage over time.
morph_description: Damage and resistances increase over time.

feature_description: Create a nexus of storm energy that deals Shock Damage to enemies in area.
Create a nexus of storm energy with increased duration.
Create a nexus of storm energy with increased radius.
Invoke Meridia's light, gaining Major Brutality and healing when dealing critical damage.
Invoke power gaining Major Brutality and Major Sorcery.
Invoke power with increased healing on critical damage.
effect_values: Major Brutality, Enhanced heal on critical

feature_description: Charge your fists with lightning, replacing your light attacks with devastating bolts.
effect_values: Transform light attacks to lightning bolts

feature_description: Charge your fists with lightning that restores Ultimate on heavy attacks.
Charge your fists with lightning dealing increased damage.
Focus your spear and thrust forward, striking enemies in front of you with multiple hits.
Focus your spear and thrust forward, dealing increased damage with final hit.
Focus your spear and thrust forward, healing yourself with each hit.
morph_description: Heals for a portion of damage dealt.

feature_description: Hurl your spear at an enemy, dealing Physical Damage and knocking them back.
Hurl a blazing spear that deals increased damage at long range.
Hurl your spear that stuns the target instead of knocking them back.
Charge with your divine lance to impale an enemy, dealing Physical Damage and interrupting them.
Charge with your divine lance, dealing damage in an area on arrival.
Charge with your divine lance, stunning the enemy and setting them off balance.
morph_description: Stuns and sets enemy off balance.

feature_description: Send blessed shards down on an area, dealing Magic Damage and stunning enemies.
Send blessed shards that create a synergy restoring resources to allies.
effect_values: AoE Magic Damage, Stun, Resource synergy

feature_description: Send blazing shards that deal damage over time in the area.
Sweep your divine spear around you, dealing massive Physical Damage to all nearby enemies.
Sweep your divine spear around you, gaining a damage buff after the attack.
effect_values: AoE Physical Damage, Damage reduction buff

feature_description: Sweep your divine spear in a crescent arc dealing increased damage.
Hurl a ball of solar fire at an enemy, dealing Flame Damage and additional damage over time.
Hurl a ball of solar fire with extended duration damage over time.
Hurl reflective light that hits multiple enemies.
Conjure a ball of solar energy to blast an enemy, dealing Magic Damage and applying Major Breach.
Conjure dark solar energy that deals increased damage and applies Minor Maim.
morph_description: Applies Minor Maim, reducing enemy damage.
effect_values: Magic Damage, Major Breach, Minor Maim

feature_description: Conjure a barrage of solar energy dealing damage over time around you.
Mark an enemy with a rune that stores damage and releases it after duration ends.
Mark an enemy with a rune that also debuffs their damage dealt.
Mark an enemy with a rune that heals you when it detonates.
Shroud an enemy in a cloak of darkness, making their next attack reflect back at them.
Shroud an enemy in total darkness, reflecting multiple attacks back.
Shroud an enemy in unstable energy that explodes when duration ends.
morph_description: Explodes for AoE damage at end.

feature_description: Call down a fragment of the sun, dealing Magic Damage and applying Major Maim to enemies.
Call down a solar prison that also stuns enemies in the area.
effect_values: AoE Magic Damage, Major Maim, Stun

feature_description: Call down a larger solar disturbance with increased radius.
effect_values: Larger AoE Magic Damage, Major Maim

feature_description: Focus your mind and rush to heal an ally, restoring their Health.
Rush to heal an ally and restore resources if they are low Health.
morph_description: Restores resources when healing low Health targets.

feature_description: Rush to heal up to 2 nearby allies at once.
Channel grace to heal you and nearby allies over time.
Channel grace to heal and revive downed allies.
morph_description: Also revives downed players in area.

feature_description: Quickly channel grace with reduced cast time.
Surround yourself with a holy aura that grants Minor Fortitude and Minor Endurance to nearby allies.
Surround yourself with a radiant aura that also grants Minor Magickasteal.
effect_values: Minor Fortitude, Minor Endurance, Minor Magickasteal

feature_description: Consume corpses near you to restore Health and Stamina.
effect_values: Consume corpses, Health and Stamina restore

feature_description: Create a cleansing ritual that heals allies and removes negative effects.
Create a cleansing ritual with extended duration.
Create a ritual that also damages enemies in the area.
Channel a massive healing ritual that continuously heals allies around you.
Channel a massive healing ritual that also grants allies damage reduction.
Channel a shorter healing ritual that heals more intensely.
morph_description: Reduced channel time, more intense healing.
